comments.author: V
comments.content:
Hello, can I use a usual stove oven in this recipe?
Thanks!
V.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Yep! When I do this in a regular oven, I'll usually use the broiler, keeping a close eye on the peppers and turning them occasionally. You do want them to really get black and blistered for maximum flavor and easy peeling.
